H0.text: In Wagner's opera 'Das Rheingold', what was the name of the dwarf who stole the gold from the 'Rhine Maidens'. Mime

H3.text: In Wagner's opera 'Das Rheingold', what was the name of the dwarf who stole the gold from the 'Rhine Maidens'. Alberich

A4.text: Alberich's theft of the Rhine gold after his renunciation of love
